Articles.Content:
By CaptianKornFlake

Our next plane is the CK 8 Chickadee (Second from left) which is a low flying low speed drone good for scouting out enemy bases at low altitude without putting kerbals at harm (Open Comm. by pressing 1). It has 4 RCS thrusters around its midsection. It also has a seperatron assisted takeoff which allows it to take off in no time at all (1 use only), but it can take off on just rcs alone. Its expensive so try not to crash it ok?

http://www./?m40674iy7lf4csw
looks great can you make a high altitude version?
It can be done, perhaps not stock though.
